inclusion.criterion: histologically proven or imaging suggestive of recurrent disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ability to understand and willingness to sign a written informed consent document
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: age greater than or equal to 18 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no more than two prior disease relapses for phase I portion of the study
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: tumor tissue available for review to confirm histological diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: prior bevacizumab use for tumor treatment
exclusion.label: triggers
